hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #deep in the wasteland# is #the Gerudo Mask#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that ##Kakariko Village## has #9# major items.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple Falling Spikes Upper Chest
